title: Kono Koi Wa, Hibana Ga Kieru Shunkan Ni
alternative_title: This Love, At The Moment The Spark Disappears ; この恋は、火花が消える瞬間に ; 이 사랑은 불꽃이 사라지는 순간에
status: This Love, At The Moment The Spark Disappears ; この恋は、火花が消える瞬間に ; 이 사랑은 불꽃이 사라지는 순간에
description:
Description :
        Yasaka Shunma, a HAMAL member, is a highly anticipated super rookie and former Japanese F3 champion. The man who he admires so much is Falcon, a legendary man who quickly conquered the F1. (Car Racing Championship)Yasaka, who was determined to fight on the same track with him (Falcon) someday, is delighted with the news that Falcon's team, Arcturus, will compete in the upcoming season!"I will face the one I admire the most.", Yasaka said uttered with excitement as he drank at the bar.At that time, a man wearing a mask and sunglasses, who knows about Falcon so much, thought how Yasaka was just like him so they ended up talking. Even though he suspected that it was too suspicious, he was so immersed in the conversation they had.On the next day, when he arrived at the press conference, surprisingly, the man who sat down and talked to him last night, was the man who he admired the most, Falcon.
